title: the Scarlet Flame
intro: Prodigy of the Flameheart House, one of the five noble houses of Everlight, Eris is famous for weaving her fire flag and dancing through the battlefield, hence, earning her the nickname of the Scarlet Flame. Since birth, she was assigned to be the personal guard of the youngest daughter of the Everlight's Paragon, Ciarra Crownsworth. They grew up together and became best friends. Eris later on joined Ciarra and the others to create the Seventh Order of Everlight, where she continued to shine through her talent and became one of the strongest flame masters in the world.

abilities.name: Unwavering Faith
abilities.details: While out of combat, Eris gains increased movement speed. Upon entering combat with an enemy hero (by dealing or taking damage from them), Eris's next basic attack within a few seconds deals bonus magic damage (scaling with magical power) and briefly grants her a burst of tenacity.

abilities.name: Flaming Sweep
abilities.details: Eris's next 3 basic attacks sweeps her blazing standard in a wide arc, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies around her. Continous hits on the same target deals additional damage.

abilities.name: Fiery Rally
abilities.details:
Eris plants down her Sacred Banner, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies. The planted banner radiates an aura, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) per second for a few seconds.

All allied heroes standing within its radius (including Eris) will be granted bonus physical and magical power.

abilities.name: Zealous Charge
abilities.details:
Eris dashes a short distance in a target direction. If Eris lands within a certain radius of her active Fiery Rally banner, the banner emits a pulse, dealing bonus magic damage (scaling with magical power) to nearby enemies, granting her and all allied heroes a shield (scaling with magical power).

Casting Fiery Rally resets the cooldowns of this ability.

abilities.name: Holy Conflagration
abilities.details: Eris's Sacred Banner releases a fiery vortex that deals magic damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies caught within and greatly slowing them.
